pullrequest.title: fix issue #48, urdf parser inserts use_parent_model_frame = true

content.html:
An alternative approach would be to use "1.4" instead of SDF_VERSION and use the Converter script to update:

diff -r b4f3e2222cae src/parser_urdf.cc
--- a/src/parser_urdf.cc    Tue Feb 25 17:30:08 2014 -0800
+++ b/src/parser_urdf.cc    Wed Mar 05 09:28:42 2014 -0800
@@ -2687,7 +2687,7 @@

   // add robot to sdfXmlOut
   TiXmlElement *sdf = new TiXmlElement("sdf");
-  sdf->SetAttribute("version", SDF_VERSION);
+  sdf->SetAttribute("version", "1.4");
   sdf->LinkEndChild(robot);
   sdfXmlOut.LinkEndChild(sdf);

This probably works though.
